name: IFICI variant - high income (â‚¬80,000)
description: IFICI regime (20% flat rate) for high income taxpayer in 2026, demonstrating tax savings vs standard regime

sources.description: IFICI flat 20% rate applied to gross salary. Social security unchanged at 11%.
sources.notes: IRS (IFICI): 80000*0.20=16000; SS: 80000*0.11=8800; Total deductions: 24800; Net: 55200; Effective rate: 24800/80000=0.31. Compare to standard regime where effective rate would be ~45%.
